function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disproportionate impact on immigrants in declining industries","Impact":"Higher job losses and fewer new job opportunities for immigrants in specific industries","Mitigation":"Support and investment in the reskilling and retraining of immigrant workers for emerging industries","Technologies":"e-learning platforms, virtual training, and online education tools","People":"Immigrant workers in declining industries","Owner":"Government, employers, and training institutions"},{"Description":"Immigrant participation gap in training and skills development","Impact":"Immigrants are less likely to participate in training and skill development, leading to a lack of preparation for a rapidly-changing labour market","Mitigation":"Targeted outreach, culturally sensitive training programs, and support for immigrant participation in training","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, language support tools, and remote training resources","People":"Immigrant workers in OECD countries","Owner":"Government, training institutions, and employers"},{"Description":"Higher training needs for immigrants in occupations at risk of automation","Impact":"Persistent gaps in training for immigrant workers in occupations at risk of automation, leading to potential job displacement","Mitigation":"Focused training programs for at-risk occupations, career transition support, and investment in upskilling immigrant workers","Technologies":"Automation software training, digital skills development tools, and job transition platforms","People":"Immigrant workers in at-risk occupations","Owner":"Employers, government, and training providers"}]}
